document_data.name: Chasm Creeper
document_data.mainbody: '''Chasm creepers''' were rare and valuable purple crystals. They could only be found growing on vertical surfaces of the deepest chasms.
document_data.Description: These beautiful crystals glowed with gentle purple radiation. The crystal base was of a brighter lavender hue, and it got darker towards the crystals' edges, becoming deep purple.
document_data.Availability: Chasm creepers could be found in the area of [[Underdark]] just below the [[Western Heartlands]]. And growing on rocky moats in the [[Astral Sea]].
document_data.Usages: Chasm creepers could be processed via [[alchemy]], extracting [[salt]]s chasm creeper. This substance could be mixed with a special variety of alchemical suspension to create an ''[[elixir of the colossus]]''.
